sentence: In early trading on Thursday, shares of Nike ( NKE ) topped the list of the day's best performing Dow Jones Industrial Average components, trading up 1.0%.
Year to date, Nike has lost about 3.8% of its value.
And the worst performing Dow component thus far on the day is Intel Corp ( INTC ), trading down 1.6%.
Intel Corp is lower by about 8.2% looking at the year to date performance.
Two other components making moves today are Procter & Gamble ( PG ), trading down 0.8%, and McDonald's ( MCD ), trading up 0.6% on the day.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
